root.name: Army Men: Sarge's War
root.description: On the verge of a long-awaited peace between the Green and the Tan, rogue elements of the Tan Army draw Sarge and his men out into the field. There, Sarge discovers a new and diabolical enemy, Colonel Malice, equipped with weapons that threaten the very existence of the Green Nation. With his squad destroyed, Sarge becomes a one-man army out to stop Colonel Malice at all costs. Never count out a toy with nothing to lose. This title is playable on Xbox 360 with a software emulator.
